p: The RaEO was tested for xanthine oxidase inhibitory activity at various concentrations and thereafter the IC 50 value was deduced. It can be observed that this essential oil has a very interesting IC 50 value (2.20 ± 0.10 μg/mL), which is comparable to that of the reference compound, allopurinol (2.6 ± 0.16 μg/mL).
